click-to-copy: Click here to copy the token link

confirmation.heading: Your Instant Visio "{{roomName}}" has been created.
confirmation.message: {{hostName}} invites you to a video chat. Join the chat now at this link: {{link}}.
confirmation.destinations-sent: You sent {{emailCount}} invitation(s) by email and {{phoneCount}} invitation(s) by phone.
confirmation.message-explanation: You can send this invitation by your own ways by copying the below invitation content.

visio-name.title: Visio title
visio-name.description: Give a title to your Visio to find it more easily.

host-name.title: Your name
host-name.description: The name the participants will see

participants.title: Participants list
participants.description: Write here the telephone numbers, email addresses and contact groups you wish to send an invitation to.
participants.description2: Telephone numbers must not contain any 'space' character.

plan-visio.title: Plan your Visio Meeting
plan-visio.description: Pick date and time to start your Visio.

date.placeholder: Click here to pick the date and time
